q: `` When somebody gets 49 points in the first three quarters obviously its going to draw attention to the other team,'' said Allen Iverson , whose career high of 60 came against Orlando on Feb. 12, 2005. When somebody's got 49 points they want to make sure I get the ball out of my hands, and that's what they did. Rafer Alston responsibly is to give it up and my teammates had to make plays. They couldn't. Stephen A. Smith was 4-for-10 from the field in the fourth and the rest of the team made 3 of 9. While Allen Iverson got cold, Kobe Bryant heated up.
